content.raw: With this change in sdformat + gazebo_1.9 + drcsim_2.7, I can launch `atlas_utils/atlas_sandia_hands.launch` with no console messages coming from the parser, which is good.  On the other hand, the log file (`~/.sdformat/sdformat.log`) is 11K lines long.  It could be that I enabled too many of the `sdfdbg` calls in the URDF parsers.  @hsu, any opinion on that?
content.html: With this change in sdformat + gazebo_1.9 + drcsim_2.7, I can launch atlas_utils/atlas_sandia_hands.launch with no console messages coming from the parser, which is good. On the other hand, the log file (~/.sdformat/sdformat.log) is 11K lines long. It could be that I enabled too many of the sdfdbg calls in the URDF parsers. @hsu, any opinion on that?
